definitions.text: a church congregation guided by a pastor
(often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
examples: he made a mint on the stock market
see the rest of the winners in our huge passel of photos

definitions.text: a group of sheep or goats
move as a crowd or in a group
examples: Tourists flocked to the shrine where the statue was said to have shed tears

definitions.text: come together as in a cluster or flock
examples: The poets constellate in this town every summer
